categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Zakala Trad was a female Zabrak bounty hunter who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War.
During the Cold War, she sold specialized gear for bounty hunters in the Combat Training section of Vaiken Spacedock.
Trad first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a level 50 Battlemaster PVP Gear vendor.
